name: DES308 Racing Game
description:
PLEASE FILL OUT THE SMALL QUESTIONNAIRE AFTER PLAYING

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1D3HqmNg6A2wxPh9_HRbBReSlH9c_eu7WuRL_aj0JtZc/edi...

This was created for DES308 - Analytics and Data Driven Design @Abertay University. You require a computer to play. It is a prototype created only for gathering data and using this data to change further versions fo the game. It looks very bad but theres no point making things look nice if it all gets changed in the end...

In this game, you are a motorsport team leader. You must tell both your drivers when to speed up and slow down in order to win the race.  Dont run out of fuel, or you wont be able to finish the race.

This game was created to collect data as you play. I will take the data and analyse it to hopefully implment improvements to the game in its next version. 

If you wish, you can opt out of data collection. No personal data is collected, only things like total play time, start/finish position, remaining fuel.
